DescriptionData.Title: Spreadbot Test Item [Attention: Not for Sale!]
DescriptionData.Description: This item is for test purpose only! Please don't try to order it.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Spreadbot is a .Net opensource multichannel manager.
It obtains products from Virto Commerce stores and lists them on such channels as eBay, Amazon etc.
Using Spreadbot you can easy create, update and manage plural sets of listings on numerous channels.
